channel.title: Dataflow on Nicolas Bontempo
channel.description: Recent content in Dataflow on Nicolas Bontempo

item.title: Processing Pipelines (Dataflow) - Introduction
item.description: Hello Guys, recently I changed a job going to a new challenge into Take. From this, I started to study some parts of the stack that I was not familiar. One of these is Dataflow. This is the start of my summary mostly provided by the study of the documentation and some coding. Processing Pipelines (Dataflow) - Introduction The library Dataflow provides several functions to intensive processing, helping the developers with concurrency-enabled applications.
